price: 実にこれはまさしく、（あなた方への）われらの糧。そこに決して終わりはない。
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزۡقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā lariz'qunā mā lahu min nafādin
